price: 46. Ar tu (Muchammedai ﷺ ) prašai jų sumokėti tam, kad jie būtų apkrauti skola?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
